data.text: Mwana wanga, ngati ulandira mawu anga
ndiponso kutchera khutu lako ku nzeru
ngati upempha kuti uzindikire zinthu
ngati ufunafuna nzeruyo ngati siliva
ndiye udzamvetsa bwino tanthauzo la kuopa Yehova;
Pakuti Yehova ndiye amapereka nzeru,
Anthu olungama zinthu zimawayendera bwino chifukwa Yehova amakhala nawo.
pakuti ndiye mlonda wa njira zolungama.
Choncho udzamvetsa tanthauzo la ungwiro, chilungamo,
Pakuti nzeru idzalowa mu mtima mwako,
Kuganizira bwino za m始tsogolo kudzakusunga;
Nzeru idzakupulumutsa ku mayendedwe oyipa,
amene amasiya njira zolungama
amene amakondwera pochita zoyipa
Amenewa ndi anthu a njira zawo zokhotakhota,
Nzeruyo idzakupulumutsanso kwa mkazi wachigololo;
amene wasiya mwamuna wa chitsikana wake
Pakuti nyumba yake imatsetserekera ku imfa;
Opita kwa iye palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe amabwerera
Choncho iwe uziyenda m始njira za anthu abwino,
Pakuti anthu olungama ndiwo ati adzakhale m始dziko
Koma anthu oyipa adzachotsedwa m始dzikomo,
